channel.title: Need help with my first server,people getting disconnected , picture inside
channel.description:
Hi , I started my first server last night. I did it becouse a kid asked me on msn and I thought "why not" , I could use the experience. So I read the "how to start a server" and I used the moparscape client as "source". I forwarded all the necessary ports ( router and firewall) but when people try to log into my server they get stuck at the "loading" phase, on my end I see them logging in and I see their chars ingame but then they get disconnected. I've included a picture of the consol on my end so you can see the info im getting: http://img218.imageshack.us/img218/2931/timedout.png
The highlighted areas are the ones I think are important , and my question is now , how do I keep them from getting timed out? I can host games on other games like on Battle.net and counter-strike, so I dunno what the problem is , please help.
Thank you for your time.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2009, 10:20:42 am[/size][hr]bump, edited the topic a little so more people understand the problem.
